About.aboutBriefQuote: If you want to see more to life, head outside and look for it

accordionItems.answer: My favorite outdoor activity is backpacking. I can't even describe how satisfying it is to hike 15-20 Kms a day, set up camp when you arrive, wake up and do it again!
accordionItems.question: What is your favorite adventure activity?

accordionItems.answer: Don't get me wrong, there are a lot of times where I need to just stay at home and do absolutely nothing! However, the outdoors always seem to have a way of keeping my energy levels high.
accordionItems.question: Why the outdoors?

accordionItems.answer: In 2020, I was able to hike Mount Hermon Lebanon's second highest peak! 20 km back and forth with an altitude of 2,814 m.
accordionItems.question: What's your biggest accomplishment?

About.accordionTitle: Get to know me a bit more

Contact.contactDescriptionFirstPart: Whether it's for working together or just simply sharing your adventure, I will be so thrilled to read all about it!
Contact.contactDescriptionSecondPart: As I mostly will be adventuring and it might take a while, rest assured that I will take the time to reply to every email personally!
Contact.contactTitle: Can't wait to hear from you!
Contact.requestFailedMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again later.
Contact.requestSuccessMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

Home.buildABlogLikeThisTitle: Want to build a Blog like this?
Home.heroTextContent:
Hi there! I'm Elie, and welcome to my land filled with adventure and things to discover. I created it in hopes to share with you the world through my eyes and for us to embark together on every journey, to live life to the fullest, and to tell a story about the world.
Ready for your next adventure? Let's go!
Home.heroTextTitle: A little bit about this land

Layout.metadataDescription: Explore outdoor adventures through travel guides, hikes, and articles on Ekadventure Blog.

Newsletter.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Newsletter.newsletterDescription: Stay up to date with my latest experiences and exclusive adventures I wanna share.
Newsletter.subscribeSuccessMessage: Thank you! If you haven't subscribed yet, you'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
Newsletter.unsubscribeNotReadyMessage: Not ready to unsubscribe? We'd love for you to stay! Check out some of our latest adventures and tips to keep your outdoor spirit alive.
Newsletter.unsubscribeStillSureMessage: If you still wish to unsubscribe from our mailing list, enter your email below:
Newsletter.unsubscribeSuccessMessage: Your request to unsubscribe has been processed.
Newsletter.unsubscribeTitle: We're sorry to see you go!

NotFound.notFoundTitle: Oops! Seems like you got lost in the wilderness.
NotFound.notFoundHelpText: Even the best explorers lose their way sometimes. Don't worry, we'll help you find your way back to the Experience.
NotFound.notFoundTrySearching: Try searching below for your next adventure.
